properties.name: app.environment
properties.description: Set the environment for the application to modify some runtime behavior.

properties.name: app.url
properties.description: This url is used when generating URLs.  For example, registration links.

properties.name: spring.security.admin.user
properties.description: The username of an in memory admin user to use for authentication.

properties.name: spring.security.admin.pass
properties.description: The password of an in memory admin user to use for authentication.

properties.name: spring.security.rememberme.cookie.name
properties.description: The name to use for the remember me login cookie.

properties.name: spring.security.rememberme.cookie.length
properties.description: The length to use for the remember me login cookie.

properties.name: spring.security.rememberme.cookie.key
properties.description: The secret key to use when generating the remember me login cookie.
